name: J.R.R. Tolkien
content: There is some good in this world, and it is worth fighting for.

name: Mary Shelley
content: Beware; for I am fearless, and therefore powerful.

name: John Green
content: The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive.

name: Louisa May Alcott
content: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.

name: Margaret Mitchell
content: Tomorrow I will think of some way to get him back. After all, tomorrow is another day.
